meanings.definition: A person who dances energetically to swing music.
meanings.sent1: At the dance party, the jitterbugs moved gracefully to the swing music.
meanings.sent2: The jitterbugs at the club were having a great time dancing to the swing music.
meanings.sent3: The jitterbugs in the dance competition impressed everyone with their energetic moves.
meanings.sent4: The jitterbugs on the dance floor seemed to float as they danced to the swing music.
meanings.sent5: The jitterbugs' passion for swing music was evident in their lively dance moves.

meanings.definition: To dance energetically to swing music.
meanings.sent1: She loves to jitterbugs with her friends whenever they play swing music.
meanings.sent2: They always jitterbugs together at the annual swing dance event.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to jitterbugs in the park, much to the amusement of passersby.
meanings.sent4: The leaves on the trees seemed to jitterbugs in the wind as the music played.
meanings.sent5: The flames of the campfire seemed to jitterbugs as they flickered in the night.
